“I think bitcoin is a good thing. I’m late to the party, but i’m a supporter of bitcoin.”

“Bitcoin is on the verge of gaining broader acceptance by conventional finance people.”

- @elonmusk

In case you missed it, there’s a military coup happening in Myanmar, Elon Musk is speaking on @joinClubhouse and we still don’t quite know what all the GameStop stock market craziness means. Bitcoin is holding at ~$33k. Here comes February 2021!
